notes: Container held at Port Qasim due to customs strike and inspection backlog. Expected delay: 48 hours.
Rain-triggered landslides in Kallar Kahar causing detour of shipments to GT Road. Highway closed.
Severe fog in Multan region affecting visibility and causing overnight halts in freight movement.
Political protests in Gujranwala blocking main transport arteries. Potential for 1-day delay.
Tropical cyclone alert along Makran Coast. Port activity suspended. Marine cargo rerouting required.
Security incident on N-25 highway delaying vehicles from Balochistan. Convoy movement advised.
Supply chain stall due to diesel shortage and fuel hoarding. Local fleets affected.
Freight misrouting due to GPS signal interference near Khanewal. Recovery initiated manually.
Eid holiday traffic surge and closures. Logistic hubs running minimal staff and limited service.
Snowfall in Skardu region triggering road blockage and flight cancellations. Emergency reroute pending.
